overview: James Harris actively serves the pharmaceutical industry with expertise in management consulting, strategic planning, pharmaceutical & biotechnology processing, drug regulations and compliance, validation, and construction of manufacturing facilities. James is a Charter member of the Pharmaceutical Manufacturers Association’s (PMA) Validation Advisory Committee and chairman of PMA’s Computerized Systems Validation Committee for the groups first ten years of its existence. Mr. Harris’s Pharmaceutical Industry Experience includes working as the Plant Manger at Bristol Laboratories (now Bristol-Myers Squibb) as the Worldwide Director of Sterile Operations at Merck & Co. and VP, Operations at GlaxoWellcome (now GlaxoSmithKline). James gained his B.S. from the University of Michigan and his M.S. and PhD in Pharmaceutical Chemistry from Purdue University.
